text: Football 5-a-side in the 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held at the Aomi Urban Sports Venue in Tokyo. ==Qualifying== There will be 8 male teams who will compete in the competition. Each team must have a maximum of fifteen squad members: eight outfield players, two goalkeepers with the other members being one guide, one coach with an assistant coach, along with a doctor and physiotherapist. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Means of qualification !! Date !! Venue !! Berths !!
